review: Does what it says, fast shipping.
author: Anita Hazeltine

review: Received free with Sling subscription.Fire TV Stick had problems finding my wifi and I had to move my tv out a little, even with the extender. The extender  isn't long enough to work, should be at least 6 ft to improve finding wifi away from an additional device (TV). plenty of nice apps for free and I received a year of prime for 49.00 instead of 99.00 because my hubby is a college student. Works better than expected and has screensavers that are nice as well.
author: Diane

review: Disappointing considering the other offerings in the same price range. It seems to me that the chief function of this device is to sell additional Amazon products. I find the interface inferior and the remote control app problematic. I would think that I will replace this item within the next 6 months. I would replace it sooner but I do not want to go to the trouble of retuning it. It does function and is better than a poke in the eye with a sharp stick
author: James D. Kirk

review: I do like it but I can't get the all connect to work to stream things from my iPhone. Also it occasionally loses connection to my wifi
author: Ethel B.

review: Awesome. Easy to install and great deal
author: Theresa A. White "T White"
